EmailTemplate.subject: Waiting on ADS-B Could Leave You Grounded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>Waiting on ADS-B could leave you grounded
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Most shops are booked out 2-6 months, which means you have less than a year to decide on ADS-B. With roughly 20,000 business jets still waiting on ADS-B upgrades, the MRO network in the U.S. cannot accommodate the anticipated volume. Schedule your ADS-B upgrade now and ask for the shortest install time upgrade for your MST 67A’s.
We’ve created an infographic that shows a scenario of how much ADS-B may cost you. Click on the below button and find out more.
FIND OUT MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/BK_MST70B_ADS-B.html]]>
Ask for BendixKing MST 70B’s, the slide-in replacement for MST 67A’s.
